transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. I often travel on a track. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I go 'choo choo!'
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
🚦 I stop at stations.

transport.question: I float on water and carry people and things. I might have sails or a motor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can travel to faraway lands.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay in one place.
🪢 Pirates used to travel on me.

transport.question: I have two wheels, pedals, and a seat. You use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I need a helmet.
🔔 I have a bell to let people know I'm coming.
🛣️ I can be ridden on a bike path.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to different countries. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings and a tail.
💺 You need a boarding pass to get on me.
☁️ I fly through the clouds.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights when I stop.
👧 I pick up kids in the morning.
🎒 I have lots of seats.

transport.question: I can travel on land or water, and carry a lot of cargo in containers. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am bigger than a boat
📦 I carry a lot of goods for shipping
🌊 I need deep water to float

transport.question: I’m a vehicle that can fly straight up and down. I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I do not have wings like a plane.
🚨 I can be used for rescue missions.
🏥 You might see me at a hospital.

transport.question: I have a motor, two wheels, and you wear a helmet when you ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle.
🚦I'm smaller than a car, but require a license.
🛣️ Some people ride me across the country.

transport.question: I travel underground, carrying many people through a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You need to go down stairs or an escalator to reach me.
🗺️ I have many stops along my route.
⚡ I run on electricity.

transport.question: I am a very fast train that uses magnets to float above the tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🧲 Magnets help me move.
🚄 I am much faster than regular trains.
🇯🇵 You can ride one in Japan.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I have a favorite snack that's small and round.
🐘 I'm the largest land animal.
💧 I can use my nose as a shower!

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with string.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈‍⬛ I purr when I'm happy.

animal.question: I waddle when I walk and lay eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐥 I start my life in a shell.
🦆 I quack.
🌊 I love to swim in ponds.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.
🌿 I eat leaves that other animals can't reach.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
💪 I have very strong legs.
🦘 I'm a marsupial.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🌱 I eat grass.
🦁 Lions like to hunt me.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I can change color to blend in.
🧠 I'm a very smart sea creature!

animal.question: I build dams and live in rivers. I have large front teeth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I cut down trees with my teeth.
🇨🇦 I am the national animal of Canada.
🏠 My home helps create ponds for other animals.

animal.question: I am a large bird that cannot fly and lives in Antarctica. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I wear a tuxedo.
🧊 I love the cold.
🐟 I eat mostly fish.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal mammal with a spiny coat that rolls into a ball for defense. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦔 I eat insects and worms.
🌙 I am active at night.
🐾 I am not a porcupine, although we look similar.
